EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-10-24 Maximize Cloud Discounts in AWS & Azure - Live Demo.ES 1 - HTML I
EmailTemplate.subject: Learn to Maximize Cloud Discounts in AWS & Azure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/enterprise-cloud-discounts/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Most customers overpay in the cloud. Others experience slow performance due to budget constraints.
On Wednesday, October 24th at 11 am ET, join our webinar “Maximizing Cloud Discounts in AWS and Azure <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/enterprise-cloud-discounts/]]>” where Director of Technical Marketing, Eric Wright, will teach you several important ways to lower cloud bills and maximize performance in the cloud.
Reserve Your Seat <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/enterprise-cloud-discounts/]]>
In this 30-minute webinar <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/enterprise-cloud-discounts/]]>, you will learn:
- How to modify pricing to reflect EPD or EA contract discounts
- How to run a migration plan incorporates these discounts
- How to optimize your performance with these discounts
This is your chance to maximize your discounts, shrink your cloud bill, and stay ahead of spending for the future. Register here <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/enterprise-cloud-discounts/]]>. Regards, Megan
